Author: favisnugget
Text: When I feel similarly, I remember that I can tell my therapist or dietician or whomever that I eat chocolate.   Eating chocolate and not purging it? = ed can’t be that bad.

Author: kmthyn95
Text: Omg you’re not alone. I stopped snacking/eating sugar for like 5 days and then one night I got bored and ate sweets and chocolate for 2 days straight. I hate myself for it but now thinking about chocolate is kinda making me wanna puke
